text: Mihai Vlad Silvășan (born January 20, 1985), is a Romanian professional basketball player. He is currently the manager of U-BT Cluj club of the Liga Națională. He represented Romania's national basketball team at the 2015 Eurobasket qualification, where he was his team's best 3 point shooter.Mihai Silvasan – EuroBasket 2015, eurobasket2015.org, accessed 14 May 2016. ==References== ==External links== * Eurobasket.com Profile * FIBA.com profile * Mihai Silvasan - 3 Point Specialist - Youtube.com Video Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian men's basketball players Category:Sportspeople from Cluj-Napoca Category:Small forwards Category:Power forwards (basketball)
title: Mihai Silvășan
